TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActivityDesignerTheme extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")]
[<System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")>]

summary.span: 为设计时环境中的设计器提供外观属性设置。

span.span: Provides the look and feel property settings to a designer in a design-time environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 设计器主题定义设计器的外观。Designer themes define the look and feel of a designer. 这包括为设计器定义的任何背景样式、前景样式、字体以及图标。This includes any background styles, foreground styles, fonts, and icons defined for the designer. 如果要为设计器独有的属性提供配置功能，可以创建自定义设计器主题。You can create a custom designer theme if you want to provide configuration abilities to properties unique to your designer. 如果没有为自定义设计器指定设计器主题，则将使用基类中的主题。If you do not specify a designer theme for a custom designer, the theme from the base class is used. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何通过从 类派生并为新主题设置适当的属性来创建自定义 。The following example shows how to create a custom by deriving from the class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#80](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#80)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#80](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#80)] 若要在 上使用主题，请将 应用于 类。To use the theme on an , apply the to the class. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#79](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#79)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#79](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#79)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指示背景色或背景渐变的起始颜色。 indicates the background color, or the beginning color of a background gradient. 若要使用背景渐变颜色，请设置 和 属性。To use background gradient color, set the and properties. 背景会逐渐地从起始颜色变为结束颜色。The background will gradually change color from the start color to the end color. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何通过从 类派生并为新主题设置适当的属性来创建自定义 。The following example shows how to create a custom by deriving from the class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme. summary.span: 获取或设置背景样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the background style.
A that describes the background style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 获取或设置背景显示颜色的方式。Use to get or set how the background displays color. 可设置为以下四种模式之一：The can be set to one of four modes: `BackwardDiagonal` 指定从右上到左下的渐变。Specifies a gradient from upper right to lower left. `ForwardDiagonal` 指定从左上到右下的渐变。Specifies a gradient from upper left to lower right. `Horizontal` 指定从左到右的渐变。Specifies a gradient from left to right. `Vertical` 指定从上到下的渐变。Specifies a gradient from top to bottom. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何通过从 类派生并为新主题设置适当的属性来创建自定义 。The following example shows how to create a custom by deriving from the class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#80](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#80)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#80](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#80)] 若要在 上使用主题，请将 应用于 类。To use the theme on an , apply the to the class. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#79](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#79)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#79](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#79)]

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources and optionally releases the managed resources used by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `disposing` 为 `true` 时，此方法将释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象占用的所有资源。When `disposing` is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

span.span: Gets the font of the text used by the theme.
The font of the designer theme.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Font` 用于显示设计器中的文本。`Font` is used to display text in the designer. `Font` 属性确定要用于在设计器中显示的常规文本的字体。The `Font` property determines the font to use for regular text displayed in the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可指定主题的前景色。Use the property to specify the foreground color of the theme. 前景色通常是文本的颜色。The foreground color is usually the color of the text. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何通过从 类派生并为新主题设置适当的属性来创建自定义 。The following example shows how to create a custom by deriving from the class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme. value.span: 与主题关联的 对象。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指派此属性会使与主题关联的画笔绘制填充直线和曲线。Assigning this property causes the brush associated with the theme to draw filled lines and curves.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ForegroundPen As Pen

summary.span: 获取用于绘制主题前景的 。

span.span: Gets the used for painting the foreground of the theme.
A that is used to paint the foreground of the theme.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于绘制指定宽度和样式的线条。The is used to draw a line of a specified width and style. 可以使用多种填充样式填充 `Pen` 对象绘制的线条，包括纯色和纹理。The line drawn by a `Pen` object can be filled in a variety of fill styles, including solid colors and textures. 填充样式取决于用作填充对象的画笔或纹理。The fill style depends on which brush or texture used as the fill object.
